overview: Mr. Sudhakaran Ram has over 18 years of experience in the semiconductor industry. Prior to joining Validity, he was Director of Hardware Engineering at NVIDIA where he led the design and production launch of the successful Tegra 1 and Tegra 2 Applications Processors. As Vice President of Engineering at PortalPlayer (prior to its acquisition by NVIDIA), he lead silicon development of the industry leading media player technology that led to design wins at Apple, Sandisk, Philips and Samsung. Prior to that, he held various senior design engineering positions at Neomagic and LSI Logic.
